title: Spring Data Cassandra with Chris Splinter | Distributed Data Show Ep. 96
description: We talk with Chris Splinter regarding Spring Data Cassandra, a slight change in our approach in how we talk about it, and a glimpse into the possible future improvements in the Java Driver to make it easier to use with the Spring Framework.
